content.en: Interconnect modeling: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to accurately simulate and model high-speed interconnect networks in very-large-scale-integration designs. These algorithms, such as moment-matching techniques and householder LS curve-fitting techniques, are used to simulate interconnects with frequency-dependent characteristics and extract equivalent-circuit parameters. The goal is to develop efficient and accurate methods for analyzing and modeling interconnects, which are crucial for the design and optimization of high-speed electronic systems.
content.da: Interconnect-modellering: Forskere udforsker forskellige algoritmer for præcist at simulere og modellere højhastigheds-interconnect-netværk i meget-store-integrationsdesigns. Disse algoritmer, såsom moment-matching-teknikker og householder LSKurve-fitningsteknikker, bruges til at simulere interconnects med frekvensafhængige karakteristika og udtrække ækvivalent-kredsløbsparametre. Målet er at udvikle effektive og nøjagtige metoder til analyse og modellering af interconnects, som er afgørende for design og optimering af højhastigheds elektroniske systemer.
